snippet.title: TV for those who enjoy massacres
snippet.description:
TV for those who enjoy massacres
In 1991, Bad: Or the Dumbing of America was published. Written by Paul Fussell, a man with experience of war, it pessimistically ran through all that was execrable in the United States with the realisation things were only going to get worse. Under bad magazines, scorn was reserved for the successful Soldier of Fortune, a â€¦
George Smith, Dick Destiny, 12 Oct 2007
